department: Art of Africa and the Americas
description: Bracelet, about 1980 Navaho made by Arthur Lujan, Taos New Mexico; maker's mark half-round band; set with single Royston turquoise of irregular shape in serrated bezel; teardrop and applique decoration; Provenance Sewell's Scottsdale Arizona, 1981; J# 1165, Cat.# 67
title: Bracelet
